title: Stinkbug Blockers
summaries: The Stinkbug Blocker and Ghostly Stinkbug Blocker are furniture items. When placed in a valid house, they will prevent NPCs from moving in.

The Ghostly Stinkbug Blocker is completely invisible when placed and can only been seen if the player has the <linked>Spectre Goggles</linked> equipped or if they are near an activated <linked>Echo Chamber</linked> similar to <linked>Echo Blocks</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
When placed in a home, prevents villagers from moving in
'Smells like cilantro'
statistics.Sell: 10 SC
